alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:57PM EDT until June 17 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR EASTERN AROOSTOOK COUNTY... At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Easton, or 9 miles east of Presque Isle, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 455 PM EDT 1 inch Hail was reported in Easton. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Mars Hill, Easton and Westfield. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
